attributes.action: allow large shops to stay open all day on Sunday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There's nothing more annoying than needing a CD and a triple sandwich on a Sunday night and finding that all the large 24 hour shops are shut. This would also create more jobs with the shop needing staff to keep the shop open.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
